item.title: MILLERKNOLL INC 10-K
item.description: MILLERKNOLL INC, which is in the Office Furniture [2520] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 26, 2022 had 34168 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 526 instances may - 392 instances million - 310 instances 2022 - 306 instances financial - 253 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
